description:
A new Honmaru Backdrop is added.
Enjoy the renowned beauty of blooming sakura at the honmaru.

Content:
 - Honmaru Backdrop "Sakura Viewing"

How to use:
Select "Settings" - "DLC Settings" - "Change Backdrop" from Honmaru.

Notes:
Under certain conditions, changes made to your honmaru backdrop will not be applied.
This content is included in the "Touken Ranbu Warriors Digital Deluxe Edition". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
There is also a product that includes this content. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.
To use this content, "Touken Ranbu Warriors", which is sold separately, is required. Also, when update data from the latest version is required, please update your game before use.
name: Honmaru Backdrop "Sakura Viewing"
